reviews.review_msg: Professor Chariandy taught about Black Canadian Literature and did an excellent job. I feel as though our discussions were clear, focused and taught me a lot more than what I came into class with. He did not enable students with their entitled opinions and instead educated them in a respectful manner. Amazing Prof!!

David is a good teacher, and an interesting person. Class was never dull. He gives strange quizzes though, they came out of left field and damaged my mark. Otherwise I recommend David highly, just watch out for the quizzes.

Great professor overall. She cares about her students, is very accommodating with assignments & everything else, and clearly cares about the content she covered in the course. Quizzes, exams, and projects are all very fair. Definitely recommend this professor!

Somewhat dull material is not improved by a hyper focus minuscule details. She's a nice person who is genuinely interested in the material, and is helpful in one-on-one discussions, but she seemed to  have a hard time leading class discussion and allowed students to interrupt her with unrelated comments/tangents.
